thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 74 of 625
thread.title: Heather

author: Heather
title: Heather
text: I was a little confused with all of the different sales and VIP and Intro offers. I added two of the promotion into my cart, and the cart was showing a different price than the item description was. I found out that you can only use one of the promotions so I was upset about that and had to delete a couple things from my order. If it wasnt for the promotions, I wouldn't be able to afford anything! But I'm glad I did get one good deal!!!
